overview: New-Looney Tunes Center Stage Vol. 2 (DVD)  Taking center stage in Volume 2 of this series are 14 top Warner Bros. animated shorts, restored to their original eye-popping, jaw-dropping quality. Fan-favorites Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Foghorn Leghorn and the Tasmanian Devil are but a few grabbing the spotlight in this comedic collection packed with lots of Looney laughs for the whole family.
title: Looney Tunes: Center Stage - Volume 2
